name: Bitcoin Trading Master: Simulator
description: This is a simulation of the digital currency trading game,the data is synchronized in real-time from online exchanges (such as: GDAX, BINANCE). You can learn how to trade digital currency in this game. The game currently supports more than 100 kinds of digital currency exchanges.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Newer Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GT210 or ATI HD 7730 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Newer Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GT 440 or better, ATI 7950 or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space
